text.tspan: Overview explaining how different parts of the code fit together.
For more info, read the comments in the source code.
The Timeline class is an observable object. Some GUI components (CategoriesVisibleCheckListBox,
DrawingArea, CategoriesEditor) register functions to be called when something in the timeline changes.
In those functions they update their part of the GUI.
For example if we add an event in the EventEditor, DrawingArea will automatically get notified that
the Timeline has changed and can redraw it.
The status of the menu items
which panel is shown in MainPanel
and wether there is an active
is owned by MainFrame. MainFrame is
controls that are interested in the
All these panels have a reference
to MainPanel so that they can call
